Title: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
Description: Possible link spoofing on the homepage when anchors are used.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.9, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.0.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.9 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.0.2
